name: Dayfall
description:
Well this is it, our first game is now in development... A platformer Metroid vanilla like: DAYFALL

You can now try out our first playable demo (only available for windows at the moment)

Lots of FEEDBACKS requested please :3

Controls; (rebindable)

- ZQSD 

- E

- LEFT MOUSE

- SPACE

The demo finish when you pass the last door.
